bibl.title: Premarital Sex, Illegitimacy, and Male Anxiety in Menander and Athens.
bibl.note: Menander's Epitrepontes (Arbitrants) provides a unique glimpse into the nature of male anxiety in classical Greece over the premarital sexual experience of women.
KONSTAN David, Premarital Sex, Illegitimacy, and Male Anxiety in Menander and Athens.
Alan L. BOEGEHOLD and Adele C. SCAFURO (Edd.), Athenian Identity and Civic Ideology (Baltimore - London, 1994) pp. 217-235.
